title: Political Mail
selftext: I moved into a new house a week ago, and it seems like the previous owner was a Trump supporter. My mailbox is stuffed with mailers from the Judicial Crisis Network, an org that funnels money into shaping the Supreme Court and lower courts with ultra conservatives do that they can mold America in their fundamentalist image. Is their any way I can stop receiving these or at the very least receive some democratic mailers to balance things out. I’ll happily take political mail from the Democratic Party or Joe Biden of it means I don’t have to look at mail referencing Amy Coney Barrett and how she’ll “save America” every single day.
